1. Deccan Plateau- Vindhyas to the north and partially enclosed by the Eastern and Western Ghats
2. Malwa Plateau- Rajasthan, Madhya Pradesh and Gujarat
3. Chota Nagpur Plateau â€“ Jharkhand, West Bengal and adjacent parts of Orissa, Bihar and Chhattisgarh
Choose the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The Chota Nagpur Plateau is situated in eastern India, which is a part of much of Jharkhand state as well as adjacent parts of Odisha, West Bengal, Bihar and Chhattisgarh. The Deccan Plateau is a large plateau situated in southern India and spread over the whole of Maharashtra and parts of Gujarat and Madhya Pradesh. Malwa Plateau spread in Rajasthan, Madhya Pradesh and Gujarat.
